boat.title: Welcome to Senang
boat.description: The Senang is equally at home sailing along the coast or on inland waters. Its meticulous maintenance and impeccable condition make it a unique vessel that glides majestically along the Seine. The Senang is designed to offer absolute comfort and a luxurious, refined experience on board.
